mainText:
Dear Steve,

 

Whilst I am learning the way of your presentation, with power but of
clarity, then this morning when I wake up I heard of such a shocking news
which hit me much, losing such a spiritual and influential leader.  Life is
full of ups and downs and it is not how long you live which makes it count,
it's how meaningful you create your life when you are still alive.

 

Rest in peace and my best wishes to you and your family.
author: Steve
